byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The hedge fund that prodded Yahoo into selling its core business has urged the American drug maker to take steps to bolster its sagging stock price.

headline.main: Starboard Value, Taking Stake in Perrigo, Looks to Make Another Big Investment Pay
